verbose_text: Thus, in this study, we observed the biological roles of HMGB1 in apoptosis and those of EMT markers in H/R injury to H9c2 cells, and found that HMGB1 induced apoptosis by increasing the mRNA and protein expression of cleaved caspase-3 and the apoptotic rate of the cells, while decreasing the expression of Bcl-2, and promoting EMT.
